snippet: A 42-year-old woman running for mayor in a southwestern state has been kidnapped and decapitated, state prosecutors said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: A 42-year-old woman running for mayor in a southwestern state has been kidnapped and decapitated, state prosecutors said Wednesday.

headline.main: Mexico: Mayoral Candidate Kidnapped and Killed, Prosecutors Say
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Mayoral Candidate Kidnapped and Killed, Prosecutors Say
